Description:

Build your empire
Edit the empire , by selecting one of the six classes of characters: magician, theocrat , rogue, warlord , or technically savvy Archdruid Fearless .
Learn useful skills that are unique to your class to develop and equip empire.
Choose their allies among the six major races (humans , high elves , dwarves, orcs , goblins and drakoniytsev ) and fantastic monsters .
Fight in the interesting tactical battles
Employ the service of legendary heroes , equip them magical weapons and put them at the head of their armies .
Crush his enemies on the detailed three-dimensional battlefield in tactical mode .
Become a master of tactics. Break down the city defenses. Learn to use approaches from the rear and hundreds of different abilities of their fighters 

Note: 

Tools for editing levels granted solely at the request of fans of the series . Its system requirements may differ from those of the Age of Wonders III, it does not work with our support service and its interface is available in English only .
Cooperative play : Random maps and individual scripts can be held jointly with other players , an alliance against computer-controlled opponents .
Game on the same computer : Random maps and individual scripts can be held jointly with other players on the same computer in "Hot Seat", an alliance against computer-controlled opponents .
